main event: A witness observed a bright, white, round object in the sky over Middletown, Ohio on February 5th, 1964 around dusk.
interesting points: The object appeared suddenly and was observed for about 5 minutes.
The object was partially obscured by low clouds at times.
The object was described as being about the size of a quarter or the head of a match when held at arm's length.
The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the observed object.
There was no sound associated with the object.
photographs: no photographs, only a hand-drawn sketch
